piccoloP5
Class PiccoloP5

java.lang.Object
  processing.core.PImage
      processing.core.PGraphics
          piccoloP5.PiccoloP5
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, PConstants
public class PiccoloP5
extends PGraphics

This is a template class and can be used to start a new processing library or tool. Make sure you rename this class as well as the name of the example package 'template' to your own library or tool naming convention.

scale in class PGraphics

setStepRes

public void setStepRes(float res)
Set the size of steps for each piccolo movement along a path. Steps are in Piccolo units so setting this to 1 will result in steps of 1mm on the default Piccolo hardware setup.

setSize

public void setSize(float width,
                    float height,
                    float depth)
Set bed size. This should match your Piccolo hardware and usbTether arduino sketch uploaded to your Piccolo. TODO: rename this to setBedSize();

draw

public void draw(PGraphics g,
                 float _drawSize)
Draw to screen. This draws all of your Piccolo draw commands waiting to be sent to a Processing PGraphics object. TODO: Possible rename this to drawToScreen or something similar, may be confused with draw to piccolo.

drawCodeStack

public void drawCodeStack(PGraphics g)
Draw to screen. This draws all of your Piccolo draw commands waiting to be sent to a Processing PGraphics object. TODO: this has been superseeded by above function. may be able to remove.

simulate

public void simulate(PGraphics g)
Draw picolo draw paths to the screen one move at a time, can be called continously in draw loop. TODO: Possible broken

start

public void start()
Send drawing commands to Piccolo for plotting. These are either done over serial or via a http connection.

update

public void update()
main library loop, checks and sends drawing commands to Piccolo if needed.

sendInt

public void sendInt(int i)
Write a int as a 4 byte packet to Serial.

pressure

public void pressure(float val)
Set pendown height for drawing 2D shapes. TODO: is this a duplicate of setpendown() ?

useHttpConnection

public void useHttpConnection(String address)
Use a http connection to send piccolo draw commands. All commands will be send directly in a POST request to the server address. A server side client will need to be in place to forward draw commands on to Piccolo, see ControlloArduino for an example for how to do this.

removeOcclusions

public void removeOcclusions(PGraphics occlusionCanvas)
Experimental function! Walks though all piccolo draw paths and removes any lines falling behind a filled space that would not be drawn to screen but are drawn to piccolo.

sayHello

public String sayHello()
Say hello. TODO: may be able to remove this as it is probably only a eample function that came with the processing library template.

version

public static String version()
return the version of the library.

Returns:
String
